name: Back to Square
description:
It is an action packed musical thriller with tons of challenging levels and quirky missions.
The levels are meticulously designed to be in synch with soundtracks. Difficulty is optimized to maximize the fun and sense of achievement.


Features

1 Simple controls to Jump and Dash
2 12 levels with thrilling soundtracks
3 Frustratingly Exciting Gameplay
4 Lots of Missions to Accomplish
5 Tons of Costumes to Unlock
6 Multiverse portal to raid other worlds
7 No forced advertisements
